projects.title: Music Streaming Website
projects.description: A comprehensive website for users to stream music and purchase albums, for artists to upload songs, and for admins to manage content and analytics.
projects.longDescription: A full-featured music streaming platform designed for multiple user groups including listeners, artists, and administrators. This project demonstrates comprehensive systems analysis and design skills with a 15-table relational database, complete UML documentation, and user-centered design approach. Features include user authentication, music streaming, album purchases, artist management, and comprehensive admin analytics.

projects.title: Concert Ticket Management System
projects.description: A system for users to buy concert tickets and for admins to manage events, seats, stages, and more.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive ticket management system that handles event creation, seat management, and ticket sales. This project showcases business analysis skills including requirement gathering, process modeling, and project coordination. Features include event management, dynamic seating arrangements, ticket purchasing workflow, and administrative controls for venue and event management.

projects.title: Customer Purchasing Pattern Analysis
projects.description: A cloud solution to analyze large-scale retail transaction data using clustering techniques and interactive dashboards.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive data analysis project that identifies customer segments using advanced clustering techniques. Built on cloud infrastructure to handle large-scale retail transaction data. The solution includes data preprocessing, machine learning implementation with K-means clustering, and business intelligence dashboards for strategic decision-making. Features interactive Power BI dashboards that visualize customer segments and purchasing patterns.

projects.title: NBA Performance Analysis
projects.description: A business intelligence solution for sports analytics decision-making with end-to-end ETL pipeline and interactive reporting.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive business intelligence solution that transforms raw NBA statistics into actionable insights. Features an end-to-end ETL pipeline, OLAP cubes for multidimensional analysis, and interactive dashboards. The system enables data-driven player evaluation and team strategy optimization through advanced analytics including roll-up, drill-down, slice/dice, and pivot operations.

experience.description: Kyanon Digital is a Vietnam-based, one‑stop digital services house delivering end‑to‑end solutions with an agile approach, driving meaningful impact across Southeast Asia.
responsibilities: Authored CMS user guides and managed 20+ change requests for AEON's iAEON super-app
Supported Agile/Scrum project planning and progress tracking for multiple client projects
Developed an AI handbook about leveraging AI tools to enhance productivity and skills in business context

experience.description: Implemented Fast HRM software (part of an ERP software) by mapping HR workflows and translating requirements into functional specifications. Collaborated with development teams to identify improvement opportunities.
responsibilities: Analyzed HR module requirements and translated them into BPMN-style flow diagrams for accurate ERP system customization
Supported system configuration and customization to ensure solutions met client needs
Collaborated with development teams to identify improvement opportunities in HR processes

experience.description: Completed Bachelor's degree in Information Systems with focus on systems analysis, business process modeling, and database management. Achieved GPA of 7.85/10 with relevant coursework in business analysis and software development.
responsibilities: Designed comprehensive SRS documentation for multiple systems analysis projects
Led cross-functional teams in delivering complex database and analysis projects
Completed coursework in Database Management, Systems Analysis and Design, Business and Data Analysis
